name: Adventures of Motharius
description:
Get inside a rich detailed fantasy world where a blacksmith needs to save the Land!

- RPG with puzzle-filled dungeons

- Turn-based combat

- 24h Day/Night system

- 9 Dungeons

- Lots of different enemies and characters

- A game filled with humor

- Bring different companions with you

This game will keep you entertained for over 40hours of fun!

Don't miss the first game of a beloved trilogy. Part 2 (The Downfall of Krynto) is also out now!
